title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: Covid was patented after all.Quote from: https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/patent/US-10130701-B2PatentÂ Â Â US-10130701-B2InventorÂ Â Â BICKERTON ERICA (GB)KEEP SARAH (GB)BRITTON PAUL (GB)AssigneeÂ Â Â THE PIRBRIGHT INST (GB)CountryÂ Â Â United StatesDatesÂ Â Â Â  Â  GrantÂ  Â  2018/11/20Â  Â  PriorityÂ  Â  2014/07/23This web page summarizes information in PubChem about patent US-10130701-B2. comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: ^^^ Doesn't this say Covid - https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/34103786/ ?If you search for it you can find other sites that say Covid as well.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: digaran on January 23, 2023, 04:13:41 AMPost it, don't want to go to another siteðŸ˜‚, coronavirus existed even before that, looks like they were trying to donate it to the public as an open source disease, but suddenly changed their mind.ðŸ¤£ I have a question, if they patent something, does that mean people should ask for permission before spreading it world wide otherwise should pay to the patent owner?Patenting doesn't protect the originators from the average person. Why not? Because the average person isn't going to steal and use the proprietary product. The average person isn't really even interested in learning about the patent, or if there is one. the protection is protection from duplication by other companies of similar caliber, and for licensing to other companies for their use. It's a 'big boy' game.Covid wasn't a problem that was much bigger than the flu if even that big. A few people regularly die from the flu every year. A handful more might have died from Covid or Cornavirus in general. Most of the people died from doctors not knowing how to handle something different and killing their patients accidentally, or from clinic and hospital business management ordering doctors to use this or that faulty procedure, and from advertising that it, C and C, were dangerous so that the stupid public went out and got a shot which was a thousand times more dangerous than C or C.In fact, if there was anything that Trump should be condemned for, it is this. He pushed "Operation Warp Speed," which produced a vaccine that is killing and maiming stupid sheeple who blindly trust the medical. Of course, Biden is worse for continuing it now that the public has waked up to the vaxx dangers, somewhat.EDIT: Btw, this post isn't mostly for you. It's simply info for any sheeple who might be interested. You aren't interested enough to go out and research it. You said so.

So worry not Christian brother.

If you are interested, peruse this site - https://andrewkaufmanmd.com/ - Quote from: https://andrewkaufmanmd.com/sovi/Isolation: The action of isolating; the fact or condition of being isolated or standing alone; separation from other things or persons; solitariness.- Oxford English DictionaryThe controversy over whether the SARS-CoV-2 virus has ever been isolated or purified continues. However, using the above definition, common sense, the laws of logic and the dictates of science, any unbiased person must come to the conclusion that the SARS-CoV-2 virus has never been isolated or purified. As a result, no confirmation of the virusâ€™ existence can be found. The logical, common sense, and scientific consequences of this fact are:...You can watch some of Dr. Kaufman's videos on Bitchute - https://www.bitchute.com/search/?query=andrew%20kaufman&kind=video.

comments.body: I don't think that there is any country that is experiencing a corona virus problem because it has been a while I've not seen anybody lamenting or commenting towards Corona virus issues or challenges across any nation so and I will say what I know but I will not say what I don't know or what I've not seen maybe in some other countries they are having or facing the challenges of coronavirus at this present time

comments.body: I saw on Twitter about how many people were forced to take the COVID-19 vaccine which was meant to reduce the population of the world. Bill Gate was one of there pioneers and the person was talking about government sanctioning for giving the public the wrong vaccine that had killed many persons. Things are really happening underworld which we might not have idea about.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I have got a silly question.if there is an actual conspiracy going on with the virus in order to control the world population or something similar.Why in the world would the people behind it need to get a patent for it?For example, if I invented a mass destruction machine and I intended to use it, I don't think I would like to catch the attention of the public by applying for a patent.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on January 24, 2023, 01:50:16 AMI have got a silly question.if there is an actual conspiracy going on with the virus in order to control the world population or something similar.Why in the world would the people behind it need to get a patent for it?For example, if I invented a mass destruction machine and I intended to use it, I don't think I would like to catch the attention of the public by applying for a patent. If you happen to look at the public a little, they got trapped by a big Covid lie. The public believed the lie. The public didn't check it out. The public is still believing the lie after millions have gotten sick and many of them died... and with all kinds of doctors and researchers showing them the lie.Nobody cares about a patent, certainly not the sheeple public. But if some do, what are they going to do about it? So, why not use patenting to protect your big corporation from other big corporations. Or why not patent the thing, and then license the rights to use it to all the big corporations?
